summary:
abimod_version 1.0 (2012). For TES V Skyrim

Craftable (daedric section), improvable and  enchantable four swords and two shields.
descriptionHtml:
About
This mod contains craftable (daedric section), improvable and  enchantable four swords and two shields.
All items can be bought in a Belethor\'s General Goods in Whiterun (depending on the level of the character).

Requirements
Perk - DaedricSmithing

Contains
Weapons:
* abiSong1H - sword;
* abiSong2H - greatesword;
* abiLost1H - sword;
* abiLost2H - greatesword.
Armor:
* abiShield of templiers - shield;
* abiShield of templiers black - shields.


Sorry, the installation path contained a mistake.
How to fix (version 1.0).
1. Copy after you install the contents of the folder Data\\Meshes\\Weaponts on to Data\\Meshes\\Weapons.
2. Delete the folder weaponts!
author: abiprofi

files.name: abiMod
files.changelogHtml: Sorry, the installation path contained a mistake. -D
